org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: env.addFiles = sh ( script: 'git diff --diff-filter=A --name-only $GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT $GIT_COMMIT ', returnStdout: true).trim() env.modifiedFiles = sh ( script: 'git diff --diff-filter=M --name-only $GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT $GIT_COMMIT ', returnStdout: true).trim()

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.name: Microservice Build and upload Docker image(modified)
Microservice Build and upload Docker image(add)
